profile:
Quality plumbing, professional service and effective solutions


We provide plumbing and heating services to the Shuswap, including service work, renovations, new construction, emergency services and gas fitting.


Trevor Krause started Proper Plumbing & Heating in 2017 to combine his passion for quality workmanship and strong business mindset. He incorporated the business in 2019, to Proper Plumbing & Heating Ltd. Trevor earned his certification as a journeyman plumber and B Level Gasfitter at Pacific Vocational College in Burnaby, BC, a school that specializes in piping trades. 


In his many years of experience, Trevor has developed a very well-rounded career. He is well versed in residential and commercial new construction, including custom homes, in floor heating systems, and a variety of custom finishes. He also has a great deal of experience in service and renovations, with the innovative problem solving skills required to provide efficient and effective solutions. 


Melissa Hamaguchi had shared the dream of owning a plumbing business with Trevor for years. With a Bachelor of Arts from UBC in English and Psychology, and a love for math and marketing, she is in charge of bookkeeping, marketing, and anything else the business requires of her. 


Trevor and Melissa are so grateful to be small business owners in their beautiful home, the Shuswap, and look forward to helping you with all of your plumbing and heating needs.
